original_text: Slaves, in reverent fear of God submit yourselves to your masters, not only to those who are good and considerate, but also to those who are harsh.
korean_text: 사환들아 범사에 두려워함으로 주인들에게 순종하되 선하고 관용하는 자들에게만 아니라 또한 까다로운 자들에게도 그리하라

sentences.original_text: Slaves, in reverent fear of God
not only to those who are good and considerate,
but also to those who are harsh.
